name: SingleRecordView
title: Single Record View
description: A component that displays a single entity record in a formatted view with metadata-driven field formatting
functionalRequirements:
## Single Record Display Component

### Core Purpose
- **Record visualization** - displays entity record fields in clean format
- **Metadata-driven formatting** - uses field types for proper display
- **Selective field display** - shows only specified fields in order
- **Smart formatting** - dates, numbers, currencies, booleans
- **Compact or expanded** - multiple layout options

### Key Capabilities
- Displays record fields in specified order
- Automatic formatting based on field types
- Currency formatting for amount fields
- Date formatting with locale support
- Boolean display as Yes/No or checkmarks
- Null/empty value handling
- Related entity name display
- Long text truncation with expand option
- Responsive layout options

### Use Cases
- Record detail panels
- Card views in lists
- Tooltip previews
- Summary displays
- Print-friendly views
- Email templates
technicalDesign:
## Metadata-Driven Display Architecture

### Design Philosophy
- **Metadata awareness** - uses entity field definitions
- **Type-based formatting** - automatic based on data types
- **Minimal configuration** - smart defaults
- **Accessibility** - semantic HTML and ARIA labels

### Technical Implementation
- Uses entity metadata for field information
- Applies formatting based on field types
- Handles various data types appropriately
- Supports custom field ordering
- Responsive to container size

### Field Type Formatting
- **Strings**: Trim and display as-is
- **Numbers**: Locale formatting with commas
- **Decimals**: 2 decimal places
- **Currency**: $ symbol and formatting
- **Dates**: Locale date string
- **Booleans**: Yes/No or ✓/✗
- **IDs**: Hidden by default
- **Long text**: Truncate with ellipsis

### Layout Options
- **List**: Label-value pairs vertically
- **Table**: Two-column layout
- **Inline**: Compact horizontal layout
- **Card**: Styled card with sections

properties.name: entityName
properties.description: Name of the entity for metadata lookup

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Fields to display in order. If not provided, shows all non-system fields

properties.name: labelWidth
properties.description: Width of label column in pixels (table layout)

properties.name: showEmptyFields
properties.description: Whether to show fields with no value

properties.name: maxTextLength
properties.description: Maximum characters for text fields before truncation

properties.name: allowOpenRecord
properties.description: Whether to show an Open Record button for the record

events.name: fieldClicked
events.description: Fired when a field value is clicked
